description:
Keroro is a frog-like alien from planet Keron, who`s on a mission to conquer Pekopon (Earth). However, when his cover is blown, his battalion abandons him and he ends up in the home of the Hinata family. There, he`s forced to do household chores and sleep in a dark basement that was once a prison cell haunted by the ghost of an innocent girl.
Keroro and his other 4 squad members continue with their plans to conquer Pekopon, aside from building Gundam Models and being lazy in various other ways...
Rephrased from ANN
Note: Starting from episode 308, TV Tokyo shortened the morning broadcast at 10:00 to 10 minutes (plus advertisement). The complete version was broadcast 2 days later at 02:05

Momoka - An Ultimate Enemy is a Difficult One to Read / Keroro & Fuyuki - Just Us Two...
桃華 強敵と書いて"とも"と読む であります/ ケロロ&冬樹 ふたりで... であります

REGULAR.description:
Momoka`s latest insanity is trying to make Fuyuki jealous by pretending to elope with somebody else.  Naturally, it doesn`t work.  And then Koyuki remembers how she and Dororo met.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La stratégie de l`escapade / Souvenirs d`une rencontre
Momoka - The Grand Running Away From Home Strategy / Dororo & Koyuki - An Encounter to Remember
桃華 駆け落ち大作戦 であります / ドロロ&小雪 出会いの記憶 であります

REGULAR.description:
Keroro`s insulted that Natsumi likes dogs better than frogs, so he turns her into a dog to teach her a lesson.  Then he tries to get embarrassing photos of her with Saburo-senpai!  And then the Keroro Platoon decides to build an aquarium, and captures an unexpected surprise.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les malheurs d`April / Keroppa l`espiègle
Natsumi - Nacchi, the Good Dog / Keroro - A Keropper`s Naughtiness
夏美 名犬ナッチー であります / ケロロ わんぱくケロッパー であります

REGULAR.description:
Not only has the entire Keroro Platoon lost their memories, but so have Natsumi, Fuyuki, and Mois!  Who could have caused this, and what started the base`s self-destruct sequence?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amnésie générale
Keroro - Eh? Who... am I? Who... is Anyone?
ケロロ え? 我が輩... 誰? みんな... 誰? であります

REGULAR.description:
First, there is a computer virus that is wiping out data all over the world.  Second, all of humanity stops, except for a few select people like Fuyuki, Natsumi, and Koyuki.  And then the invaders come...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les nouveaux envahisseurs
The Keroro Platoon - The Day Pekopon Stood Still!?
ケロロ小隊 ペコポンが静止する日!? であります

REGULAR.description:
Earth is falling to the invaders, and the Keroro Platoon is helpless to stop them.  Even though the Galulu Platoon is supposed to be another part of their own army, the Keroro Platoon don`t really want the Earth to be invaded, and they`re now fighting to save it.  But compared to the Galulu Platoon, they`re hopelessly outmatched, and all seems lost.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Terre, planète de l`amour
The Keroro Platoon - Pekopon!! Impending Destruction of a Loved Planet!!
ケロロ小隊 ペコポン!! 滅び行くか愛の星よ!! であります

REGULAR.description:
Earth is falling to the invaders, and the Keroro Platoon is helpless to stop them.  Even though the Galulu Platoon is supposed to be another part of their own army, the Keroro Platoon don`t really want the Earth to be invaded, and they`re now fighting to save it.  But compared to the Galulu Platoon, they`re hopelessly outmatched, and all seems lost.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bien à vous sincèrement
The Keroro Platoon - The Sincerity That You Showed Me
ケロロ小隊 まごころを君に であります

REGULAR.description:
The Keroro Platoon is getting serious about invading!  Only they`re acting very strangely.  Why are their eyes suddenly a different shape?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - Farewell, my Dear Keroro! / Keroro - Countdown to Ruin
ケロロ さらば愛しきケロロ! であります / ケロロ 滅亡へのカウントダウン であります

REGULAR.description:
Keroro`s latest plan to invade Pekopon is by dominating with a mega-chain of burger shops. Then Momoka`s latest plan to hook up with Fuyuki is by hosting a cherry blossom viewing party, which includes some kind of magical cherry blossom tree that makes two people fall in love!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - The Monumental Depths of a Smile Sale! / Momoka - The Grand Cherry Blossom Viewing Love-Love Strategy!
ケロロ 新装開店スマイルセール! であります / 桃華 お花見でラブラブ大乱戦! であります

REGULAR.description:
When Fuyuki and Natsumi stumble into a secret underground alien city, they go undercover as aliens, but with the frogs there too, chances are good that their cover will be blown! Then, after much prodding by Keroro, Giroro tries to find a hobby that suits him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki & Natsumi - Convenient Invaders / Giroro - A Time for Hobbies
冬樹&夏美 勝手に侵入者 であります / ギロロ 趣味の時間 であります

REGULAR.description:
When Natsumi learns of the frogs` latest scheme, which has them impersonating doctors and nurses at a school physical exam, it`s time to bust some heads! That same evening, Fuyuki and Natsumi are having a "sibling spat." Keroro eggs them on to avoid getting in trouble himself, and arm-wrestling ensues...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsumi - The Dreaded Health Inspection / Fuyuki & Natsumi - The Grand Sibling War!
夏美 恐怖の身体検査 であります / 冬樹&夏美 姉弟大戦争! であります

REGULAR.description:
Tamama wakes up without a tail!  Has he finally become an adult?!  And then Momoka hatches yet another wild scheme to spend time with Fuyuki, which lands them on an island with some unexpected Kululu dangers...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tamama - Monopoly! A Time for Adults / Fuyuki & Momoka - The Island of Doctor Kururu
タママ 独占! オトナの時間 であります / 冬樹&桃華 ドクタークルルの島 であります

REGULAR.description:
It`s Mothers` Day! Natsumi and Fuyuki want to give their mother a special gift, but Keroro has other ideas.  And then it`s Space Mothers` Day, with Dororo`s mother visiting!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - Lord Mama`s Grand Rejuvination / Dororo - Silently Running Wild on the Galaxy Express
ケロロ ママ殿癒し系大作戦 であります / ドロロ 沈黙の暴走銀河特急 であります

REGULAR.description:
Keroro gets terribly sick with some mysterious illness, and the only cure seems to be... starfruit?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - Quite Possibly the Best Medicine Ever / Keroro - All Paths Lead to Star Fruits!
ケロロ すこしふしぎな特効薬 であります / ケロロ すべての道はスターフルーツへ続く! であります

REGULAR.description:
Koyuki and Natsumi have a sleepover.  And then the frogs decide to impersonate Natsumi`s mother for her teacher`s home visit, somehow thinking this is a good idea.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koyuki - A Shinobi Pajama Party / Natsumi - The Shocking Teacher`s Visit!
小雪 忍流パジャマパーティー であります / 夏美 ドッキリ家庭訪問! であります

REGULAR.description:
The unlikely friendship between Kululu and Saburo was formed after a ferocious battle in which they both wielded the Reality Pens. Now Keroro and company dive into Kululu`s memories to go back to that time and try to locate the second reality-altering pen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu & Saburou - The Artist`s Decisive Encounter!
クルル & サブロー 出会いはお絵かきガチンコ勝負! であります

REGULAR.description:
After Keroro discovers that Natsumi is terrified of slugs, he has Kululu super-evolve one into a heroic-type humanoid, Wettle King. The faux hero takes on the repulsed Natsumi, but Fuyuki may turn out to be a tougher enemy. Later, Kululu soups up his creation even more, turning him into the more powerful Giant Wettle King, able to take down Natsumi and anyone who sticks up for her. Except, what happens when Wettle King truly starts to become heroic?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - Battling Our Wettol King / Natsumi - Returning Home to a Wettol King
ケロロ 戦え僕らのウェットルキング であります / 夏美 帰ってきたウェットルキング であります

REGULAR.description:
Giroro helps two young aliens help themselves when they come to Earth seeking vengeance for their father. Then, Dasonu☆Maso`s younger sister, Dasonu☆Marie, studies comedy by observing the masters, the Keroro platoon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro - My Way of Getting Revenge! / Keroro - Dasonu Maso Again and Again and Again?
ギロロ あだ討ちするはわれにあり! であります / ケロロ またまたまたダソヌ☆マソ? であります

REGULAR.description:
Keroro takes a stand against Nyororo`s inevitable annual dehydration attack by creating a mech version of the creature to combat it, while at the same time makes a movie about the situation for a contest. Later, Keroro adopts the refurbished mech as a pet, but Tamama`s jealousy unleashes a danger to the whole planet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - Nyororo VS Mecha Nyororo / Keroro - Regarding the Disposal of the Nyobo
ケロロ ニョロロ対メカニョロロ であります / ケロロ ニョボと共に去りぬ であります

REGULAR.description:
Keroro realizes that he`s never had a glimmerbath, which is the first bath taken after a tub`s been cleaned and polished.  Resentful that Natsumi is always the first in, he tries to get her to concede it to him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - Aiming for that Shining Flow! / Mois - A Diary About Uncle
ケロロ ピカフロをねらえ! / モア おじさま日記

REGULAR.description:
Desperate to learn Fuyuki`s Tanabata wish, Momoka tries to steal all of the paper strips to read it.  But Keroro`s already stolen them, for research into the invasion!  And then the Keroro Platoon tries to radiojack 623`s show, faking Sumomo as a guest star again.  Giroro`s horrified when they make him play the role all over again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - Wishes on Tanabata / Keroro - Revival! The Extraordinarily Talented Dopamine
ケロロ 七夕に願いを! / ケロロ 復活! 怪傑ドーパミン

REGULAR.description:
The Ghost Girl goes to Natsumi`s school and winds up accidentally possessing a classmate.  And then the Keroro Platoon decides to start a curry shop.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ghost Girl - Let`s Go to School / Kururu - The Sergeant Major of Curry
幽霊ちゃん 学校へ行こう / クルル カレーの曹長さま

REGULAR.description:
Giroro sets up a survival camp in the mountains for the Keroro Platoon, but he reckons without Natsumi and Koyuki coming on a camping trip, too.  And then, Keroro comes up with the bright idea to mess with Natsumi`s stamina by preventing her from eating eel on Midsummer`s Day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro - How Grand! Summer Training Camp / Keroro - Capturing a Late Saturday Night`s Shine!
ギロロ 壮絶! 夏合宿 / ケロロ 土曜の丑の日をつかまえろ!

REGULAR.description:
Hicksville Beach returns!  This time, they have a male swimsuit competition, and Natsumi convinces Fuyuki to enter, because the prize is 623`s autograph.  Then Momoka gets accidentally hit by Kululu`s aging gun!  Why doesn`t anybody recognize her as a sexy adult?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - Doinaka Coast Returns / Momoka - One Summer Experience
ケロロ 土井中海岸リターンズ / 桃華 ひと夏の経験

REGULAR.description:
Karara returns, having trained to become Dororo`s bride!  But Mecha Viper is back, too.  When Karara mistakes Viper for Dororo, she starts begging him to teach her ninjutsu!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo - The Lady Ninja Karara Makes Her Appearance!
ドロロ くの一カララ シュシュッと参上!

REGULAR.description:
After Keroro plays a cursed DVD, he finds himself trapped in his room, with a monster waiting in the hallway. Then, Keroro "helps" the irritable Natsumi by creating a robot that enforces everything she decides to ban, but seems to pick on Giroro especially.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu, The DVD of Curses / Natsumi, By All Means, What is This Prohibition!
クルル 呪いのDVD / 夏美 何がなんでも禁止よ!

REGULAR.description:
The Hinata family and frogs visit Grandma`s house in the countryside for o-bon vacation, but in the woods there seems to be a ghost that can become the very thing they fear. Later, Tamama is training in the mountains at Grandma`s house when he spots a turtle on its way somewhere. Throughout the day and into the night, Tamama checks on its progress until he`s rewarded with knowing the turtle`s final destination.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Visiting Grandma Hinata`s House / Tamama and the Turtle
日向家 里帰り / タママとカメ

REGULAR.description:
Keroro, Dororo, and Giroro are reminded of the summer vacation day they went to Planet Hiquesviel as kids, to search for Viper pirate treasure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, That Treasured Summer
ケロロ 夏の宝物

REGULAR.description:
Keroro takes the whole platoon to get conveyor-belt sushi!  And then Keroro gets accidentally turned into a half-mosquito.  Will they ever be able to get him back together again?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Morally Spinning Sushi! / Keroro, The Dreaded Mosquito
ケロロ 仁義なき回転寿司! / ケロロ 恐怖のザ・モスキート

REGULAR.description:
Kululu invents a device that can allow people to enter videogames!  Most of the frogs and Natsumi eagerly dive right in.  But Giroro can`t stand to let Natsumi rescue the prince, Keroro`s too busy looting to level up, and why is Dasonu Maso the one giving out quests?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro & Natsumi, Which Way to Heroes?!
ケロロ&夏美 勇者はどっちだ?!

REGULAR.description:
Keroro sneaks off to the moon hoping to dump the invasion deadline counter there, so that he can pretend he never got it.  Then the deadline won`t count, right?!  But the counter can apparently move, and has ideas of its own.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - Secret Monday Vacation / Giroro - Typhoon Invasion Operation Commences!
ケロロ こっそり月旅行 / ギロロ 台風侵略作戦決行!

REGULAR.description:
Desperate to invade the Earth before the deadline, Keroro makes up a fake god and cons people into paying to pray for it.  Then, miraculously, their wishes start coming true!  Does the invasion actually stand a chance of happening?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Finally Prays to God?
ケロロ 最後は本気で神頼み?

REGULAR.description:
The invasion deadline counter, Mash, has turned into the horrifying invasion weapon, Kiruru!  What`s more, Kiruru has retooled himself to absorb shilly-shallying and procrastination as energy.  Is Earth totally doomed?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiruru - The Messenger of Destruction
キルル 破滅の使者

REGULAR.description:
Now that the invasion deadline is no longer haunting them, Keroro is all ready for some well-planned slacking off!  The platoon sets up their duplicates to do all of the housework, and they make plans for having fun.  But the duplicates are always a recipe for trouble...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Platoon All Members Reboot! / Garuru Platoon Everyone Fight!
ケロロ小隊 全員再起動! / ガルル小隊 かく戦えり

REGULAR.description:
Curious about why Giroro`s sneaking away to take a day off, Natsumi decides to follow him by stowing away.  The reason isn`t what she expected!  And then Momoka`s father will do anything to make sure Sports Day is sunny.  But Fuyuki desperately wants it to rain!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro - A Secret Day Off / Baio - Conquer the Sports Festival
ギロロ 秘密の休日 / 梅雄 運動会を支配せよ

REGULAR.description:
A trainee assassin gets sent to take on Dororo for a graduation exam.  But how can he possibly defeat such a powerful assassin?!  Then Natsumi finds a bluebird she wants to keep as a pet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo - The Chance is Important! / Natsumi - My Bluebird
ドロロ キッカケが大事! / 夏美 私の青い鳥

REGULAR.description:
It`s Halloween, and everyone is having fun dressing up in costumes to attend a monster-themed party!  But then a real alien monster starts stalking Fuyuki... to Momoka`s rage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arisa - Hunter of Darkness, Halloween in Chaos!
アリサ 闇の狩人 ハロウィン大騒動!

REGULAR.description:
When Keroro gets a cold, he loses his voice! Is there a frog in his throat? Later, Fuyuki and Kululu are pursued below the streets of Akihabara. Amid all of the mysterious, out-of-place artifacts, can they find a way to fight back against their well-armed opponent?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro If You Catch a Cold, It`ll be Fixed in Post-production!? / Fuyuki & Kururu Go to Akihabara
ケロロ 風邪をひいたらアフレコだ!? / 冬樹 & クルル 秋葉原を行く

REGULAR.description:
When Karara and Chiroro come to Earth, they`re chased by a furious, godlike being who will destroy the planet unless the Keroro platoon can somehow soothe his soul. Later, Keroro learns not to waste a single grain of rice after he has a Kululu-influenced realistic dream in which he becomes a rice grain who just wants to be eaten...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Karara & Chiroro Nagomi(753)-san / Keroro It`s Only One Grain Left
カララ & チロロ 七五三に753(なごみ)さん! / ケロロ たかが1粒されど1粒

REGULAR.description:
The Hinatas and frogs go on a day trip to a hot spring for Labor Day, but Aki freaks out when she sees a wild monkey in the bath. Her panic leads to an army of more monkeys descending on the hot spring. Later, Keroro and the other members of his platoon are inspired to bake Keronian bread, but little do Fuyuki and Natsumi know that this alien version of bread is more like a battle between edible gargantuan mechs that look like their respective bakers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aki - War at the Onsen!/Keroro - Go! Keroropan
秋 温泉で大合戦! / ケロロ それいけ! ケロロパン

REGULAR.description:
The platoon sets up an outing to show their appreciation for the Hinata siblings, but when Keroro blows the barbecue money on a Gundam model, he tries to make up for it by profiting from the sale of the General Brat alien`s recital tickets... which doesn`t go so well. Later, Keroro and company try to make up for the previous debacle by preparing a sukiyaki party. Despite a few hitches, it goes smoothly until Kululu decides the event is too boring...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro It`s a Field Trip Until You Say I`m Home! / Keroro Sukiyaki of Love and Sorrow
ケロロ ただいま! と言うまでが遠足だ! / ケロロ 愛と悲しみのスキヤキ

REGULAR.description:
Keroro tries to create a tokusatsu character show based on the Keroro Platoon characters!  But all does not go according to plan.  The newspaper club is also interested in who`s really beneath those costumes...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Keroro Show / Fuyuki & Chiruyo KGS Returns
ケロロ ケロロショー / 冬樹 & 散世 KGS再び

REGULAR.description:
556 has caught a space cold, and he`s spreading it to everyone he meets.  Horrifyingly, it makes everyone act exactly like him!  Just like a Caries War, the Keroro Platoon shrinks down to go into his body and destroy the invaders there.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 556 Central Tokyo is a Man`s Battlefield
556 奥東京市は男の戦場

REGULAR.description:
The platoon has to spend the remainder of their invasion budget, almost 400 million yen, before the year is up, so they go on a wild, wasteful spending spree that makes Keroro nervous for some reason. Later, Keroro has to do something about his hoarder problem, as he`s got a warehouse full of Gundam models, DVDs, etc, but needs to put everything away in the relatively small confines of his own room.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Platoon Super Battle Operation: Tax Return / Keroro A Certain Man`s Fight
ケロロ小隊 年末調整大作戦 / ケロロ ある男の戦い

REGULAR.description:
The Nishizawa Christmas party looks to be spoiled by a sudden blizzard in Inner-Tokyo that turns into ice age-conditions. Can Fuyuki and Geroro find the culprit before this white Christmas becomes a whiteout?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Central Tokyo`s Ice Age / Arisa Has Come
ケロロ 奥東京氷河期 アリサが来た!

REGULAR.description:
Keroro wakes up on January 5th, having slept through the entire New Year`s holiday.  He goes on a rampaging temper tantrum!  And then the platoon tries to invade right after New Year`s, perhaps to make up for it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Give me back my New Year / Giroro, Let`s Get Working on the Pekopon Invasion!
ケロロ お正月を返して! / ギロロ 仕事初めはペコポン侵略!

REGULAR.description:
Keroro`s father drops by to visit, but Mecha Viper R dropped in first!  Can Keroro`s father, the ultimate sergeant, save them from the fate of being bronze statues?  And then the Hinata house starts sinking, thanks to too much secret base digging underground...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Miracle?! Keroro`s Father / Hinata House, Submerge!
ケロロ 奇跡!? ケロロの父 / 日向家沈没

REGULAR.description:
There`s a terrible Dekamimian in town, an alien with huge ears who never takes care of his pets!  The space police officers want to arrest him, but he knows their faces.  So what to do?  Why, deputize Natsumi to go undercover, of course!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, A Bold-Faced Fake Fairytale The Ear`s Conundrum
ケロロ 鉄仮面伝説 謎のデカ耳

REGULAR.description:
Tired of how long the invasion is taking, the Kero Army sends Urere, an incredibly effective invader, to take over in one day!  But Keroro seems oddly apathetic about Urere`s strategy.  And then 556 invites them over to his place, where a murder mystery ensues...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Urere, the Salesman Invader / Keroro, And After All Even If Everybody Becomes...
ウレレ 売れっ子侵略者 / ケロロ そしてやっぱり誰もいなくなった

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious transfer student who turns out to be from Pluto is trying to get Earthlings to not forget about her planet.  But she`s fighting a losing battle because their memories keep on erasing, no matter what she does about it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Remembered Darkness?
冥 おぼえていますか?

REGULAR.description:
Momoka`s butler, Paul, thinks it`s time to retire, so he tries to find his replacement by hosting a tough audition competition that brings in both mysterious (the Masked Butler) and audacious (Keroro) participants. Later, Valentine`s Day rolls around again and Giroro gets chocolates from Natsumi. Or at least he thinks he does... but to be sure, he has to investigate all the possibilities.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Paul, A Deacon`s One Minute / Giroro, Rhythm and Pace?
ポール 執事の一分(いちぶん) / ギロロ くれたのは誰?

REGULAR.description:
It`s old-timey thrills and chills for our frog friends, when the gang visits Historical Wonderland!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koyuki, Historical Theme Wonderland / Keroro, The Mysterious Mouse of the Fantasy Wonderland!
小雪 時代劇ワンダーランド! / ケロロ チュー兵衛様に飛びつこう!

REGULAR.description:
Alisa`s back, and she`s out to use Fuyuki as bait for further prey.  But this time, the residents of Alien Town have caught on to Alisa`s activities, and they`ve decided to draw her out themselves.  The hunter may become the hunted!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alisa, Alien Versus Monster
アリサ エイリアン対モンスター

REGULAR.description:
Giroro learns that he`s been promoted to Platoon Leader for another planetary invasion, and must depart that very night! How will he bid farewell to his beloved Natsumi?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, An Established Time to Journey
ギロロ 旅立ちのとき

REGULAR.description:
Keroro has a brilliant plan for White Day: they`re going to make white chocolates and sell them!  What could possibly go wrong with... wait, is Kululu involved in this?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiruyo, Checking up on White Day / Fuyuki, I Know How to Use The Application
散世 ホワイトデーをチェック! / 冬樹 ご利用は計画的に

REGULAR.description:
A major intergalactic travel program has chosen Earth to spotlight, and Keroro helped them with the highlights!  There`s lots of reminiscing about previous episodes, especially those embarrassing Giroro, but Keroro seems to have something sneaky planned...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Frequent Appearance! Planet Andou`s Heaven
ケロロ 出没! アド星ック天国

REGULAR.description:
The Keroro Platoon is all set to come up with a doozy of a 100th invasion strategy!  But then an alien invader, one who swallows up entire planets, approaches.  Earth may be doomed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kerokero Military Operation, Number 100
ケロロ ケロケロ作戦第100号

REGULAR.description:
The Keroro Platoon is all set to come up with a doozy of a 100th invasion strategy!  But then an alien invader, one who swallows up entire planets, approaches.  Earth may be doomed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Farewell Sergeant Keroro
ケロロ さらばケロロ軍曹

REGULAR.description:
The Keroro Platoon comes up with a new, catchy tune to win the hearts and minds of Pekoponians, starting with the kids at Kissho Academy. Later, when the platoon enters an HQ-sponsored resonance contest, they find that their resonance has unpredictable physical effects on a variety of things around them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Platoon, Cut a Good Tune! / Keroro Platoon, Large Resonance!
ケロロ小隊 絶好調! / ケロロ小隊 大共鳴!

REGULAR.description:
When Mecha Viper returns (again) for revenge, the Keroro Platoon tests out their new robots on him. Later, the platoon attempts a new challenge, securing a space at a park for cherry blossom viewing, the night before a prime viewing day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Unite! Keroro Robo / Keroro, Invasion! Cherry Blossom Frontline Extreme!
ケロロ 合体! ケロロロボ / ケロロ 侵略! 桜最前線

REGULAR.description:
Pururu: Leave It to the Chief Nurse, Sir! / Natsumi: Today`s Horoscope, Sir!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pururu, A Chief Medic`s Safeguard! / Natsumi, Today`s Fortune Telling
プルル 看護長におまかせ! / 夏美 今日の占い

REGULAR.description:
The Keroro Platoon has one day to send a report to HQ that details all of their invasion efforts since arriving on Pekopon, so they start crafting a heroic narrative on DVD by editing in bits and pieces of video footage from their misadventures. Later, Chief Nurse Pururu wants to know what the platoon has really been up to all this time, so Keroro gives her and the other members a peek into the memories of a reluctant Giroro... but Kululu and Keroro quickly get sidetracked with the amusing prank of editing Giroro`s memories.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Past Glories / Giroro, Prohibit those Memories!
ケロロ 過去の栄光 / ギロロ 禁断の記憶

REGULAR.description:
Keroro orders Kululu to build him a collectible card game that he can use to market and make loads of money!  But, of course, he has to beat the whole platoon to prove how superior he is with it.  And then a mysterious organization seems to have been keeping tabs on the Keroro Platoon...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Climax! Card Battle / Keroro, A Proposal to Dissolve the Platoon
ケロロ 白熱! カードバトル / ケロロ 狙われた小隊

REGULAR.description:
Momoka`s mother decides to come and visit for Mothers` Day!  This is more terrifying than it sounds, as she`s a notorious street fighter who will break through any defenses, including the elite corps of bodyguards, Paul, and her husband in order to see her daughter again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, The Strongest Mother`s Day
桃華 最強の母の日

REGULAR.description:
The insane Keronian Putata puts in an appearance, with a strange paint that can make things become real.  Worse, Mekeke, the puppetmaster, shows up with him.  Will the Keroro Platoon ever be able to defeat them, or are they about to lose their secret base for good?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Putata & Mekeke, Zealous Killers
プタタ & メケケ 必殺お仕事人

REGULAR.description:
After Kululu locks the rest of the platoon into their new secret base, Keroro and the rest reminisce about their childhood secret base, and a strange Keronian they knew named Joriri.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibi Kero, That Time Joriri
ちびケロ あのころジョリリ

REGULAR.description:
Natsumi gets a double-whammy of bad news: Saburo, her crush, is switching schools, and her favorite radio show host, 623, is taking his act to the US! Ninja Koyuki stealth-drags Natsumi to the station to find out the truth, even as the Keroro platoon "radio-jacks" the show. Later, Alisa Southerncross returns to hunt in Inner-Tokyo when a creature makes it rain incessantly... but only in Fuyuki`s general vicinity, for some reason.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsumi, Saburo, Is This Goodbye? / Fuyuki and Alisa, The Rain`s Monster
夏美 さよならサブロー / 冬樹&アリサ 雨の怪物

REGULAR.description:
While fleeing from the annual rainy season Nyororo, Keroro and crew head back billions of years into the past, where they have a chance to wipe out the Nyororo before they come into existence! Then 556 is upset when his little sister, Lavie, is about to get married, but the romantic Natsumi enlists Keroro`s help to convince him to accept it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Nyororo Destruction? / Rabbi, Script of an Honorable Bride!
ケロロ ニョロロ滅亡? / ラビー お嫁に行きます!

REGULAR.description:
When Keroro is hospitalized with a bad back, Kululu becomes acting commander in his place, a terrifying prospect for the rest of the platoon when they have to show hospitality to a peevish but important ambassador from another planet. Later, right when ninja Koyuki wants to become "normal," the Keroro platoon invites her to join their new "Let`s Become Normal" class, but little does she suspect it`s really their secret plan to turn her into a Pekoponian spy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu, Temporary Leader / Koyuki, Training Hard as Usual
クルル 臨時隊長 / 小雪 普通猛特訓

REGULAR.description:
While the real Wettle King is on a heroic journey out in space, Keroro and crew build a robotic impostor to take on "Natsumigeddon" again! Later on, when Kululu uses a giant slug to make yet another version that ends up menacing everyone, can the real Wettle King save the day, even though he`s millions of miles away?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Smash! Wettol Robo / Keroro, Assault! Wettol Human
ケロロ くだけ! ウェットルロボ / ケロロ 突撃! ウェットルヒューマン

REGULAR.description:
Lavie wins cup ramen in a supermarket raffle, and 556 tries to figure out what it is and how it works!  Later, Keroro is determined to complete a crossword puzzle, wrongly assuming that the prize is a year`s supply of Gundam models!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 556 Cup Noodles Recipes / Keroro, Capture! Crossword
556 カップメンの作り方 / ケロロ 攻略! クロスワード

REGULAR.description:
Keroro notices that when things are available as exclusive, limited-time-only versions, people value them more.  So he has Kululu build a gun to turn anything they want into these!  But when the exclusive items flip over to "no longer available," the trouble begins...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, The Big Plan for Period Restriction / Momoka, My Limited Tanabata
ケロロ 期間限定大侵略 / 桃華 七夕限定の私

REGULAR.description:
Urere, the popular invader, shows up again, this time with a plan he doesn`t mind letting the Keroro Platoon take credit for!  But while his train tracks are crisscrossing Japan, there might just be an ulterior motive hidden behind them.  Later, Giroro gets turned into a liquid and helplessly tries to protect Natsumi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Urere, The Reverend King of the Trains / Giroro, Beauty and the Liquid Keronian
ウレレ 電車の王様 / ギロロ 美少女と液体ケロン人

REGULAR.description:
Fuyuki and Keroro go to investigate the seven mysteries of the school.  And then Pururu decides to stay with a certain memo-taking member of the Journalism Club who thinks the aliens are a comedy troupe...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki and Keroro, Inaccurately! The Seven Wonders / Pururu and Chiruyo, Secret Friends
冬樹&ケロロ あばけ! 七不思議 / プルル&散世 秘密の友だち

REGULAR.description:
Tamama is going through a natural rebellious stage in his life and to help him get through it, the rest of the Keroro platoon and the Hinata siblings must go through a specific set of steps... but every time someone screws up, they have to start over again! Will Tamama ever get past being a delinquent?! Later, while Kululu is left home alone, an automatic invasion machine is about to attack Earth. The unlikely trio of Fuyuki, Natsumi, and Kululu team up to stop it! Though you never know with Kululu...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tamama, Rebellion is a Regrettable Reason / Kururu, When is He a House-sitter?
タママ 理由なき反抗 / クルル と お留守番?

REGULAR.description:
When the Hinata family and the Keroro platoon make their annual trip to Hicksville Beach, they find that it`s "gone Hollywood" over the upcoming US feature film adaptation of Gundam ripoff Dangal. But there are also two UMAs in town and at least one of them is there to make trouble. Monster-hunting living doll Alisa enters the fray to stop them and chow down, but finds that there`s more than meets the eye with her prey.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arisa and Fuyuki, UMA Vs. Dangal!
アリサ & 冬樹 UMA対ダンガル!

REGULAR.description:
When Fuyuki goes looking for a kappa in a small town on the outskirts of Tokyo, Keroro ends up being abducted by a boy who takes the sergeant to be his lost (kappa?) friend, Capu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Yamato and Kappa
ケロロ ヤマトとカプー でありんす

REGULAR.description:
Keroro and his squad hold a concert for worldwide broadcast, featuring DANCE☆MAN! (Or is it...?) Then, while everyone is visiting Grandma Akina, Dororo meets a mysterious girl in the mountains.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Butchered Hair, and the Afro Ondo? / Dororo, Mysterious Mountain
ケロロ ブッチャ毛 アフロで音頭? / ドロロ 不思議の山

REGULAR.description:
Desperate to escape the summer heat, Keroro and the rest shrink themselves down to tiny size in order to enjoy a child`s wading pool as a fantastically huge place to swim.  But it goes terribly wrong when full-sized Natsumi decides to go into the pool, too.  Soon after that, Natsumi and Fuyuki decide to find out where the frogs have been sneaking off to every morning...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Dive! Vinyl Swimming Pool / Fuyuki & Natsumi, A New Morning Has Come
ケロロ 飛び込め! ビニールプール / 冬樹 & 夏美 新しい朝がきた

REGULAR.description:
Distressed by his summer homework, which he left until the last minute again, Fuyuki goes complaining to Keroro, who reminisces about his childhood one summer in which he did the same thing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibi Kero, Farewell to Summer Vacation!
ちびケロ さらば夏休み!

REGULAR.description:
Another member of the Shurara Corps, a Keronian who`s made entirely out of gas, appears!  And then Keroro decides to invade the Earth by using Gundam models.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dokuku, Gas Keronian is No. 1 / Keroro, Pekopon`s Gunpla Man
ドクク ガスケロン人第1号 / ケロロ ペコポン一のガンプラ男

REGULAR.description:
Still too shy to say anything to Fuyuki about wanting to spend time with him, Momoka begs the Keroro Platoon to turn her into a ghost so that she can follow him around to her heart`s content.  Kululu`s machine may work, but... is there actually any way to turn her back again?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, Ghost: The Hinata Family`s Phantom
桃華 ゴースト 日向家の幻

REGULAR.description:
Still too shy to say anything to Fuyuki about wanting to spend time with him, Momoka begs the Keroro Platoon to turn her into a ghost so that she can follow him around to her heart`s content.  Kululu`s machine may work, but... is there actually any way to turn her back again?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Running for Election! / Natsumi and Giroro, the Two Who Are Unable to Return
ケロロ 出馬する! / 夏美&ギロロ 帰れない二人

REGULAR.description:
Karara and Chiroro show up again, intent on winning Keroro`s heart!  But Tamama cannot bear that, and Mois-chan is hurt that they are even trying.  Pururu shows up to save the day, but maybe she is not as helpful as they all think, either!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, War Is a Big Scramble
ケロロ 争奪大戦争

REGULAR.description:
A former Keronian assassin and insect fan shows up to tell the Keroro platoon that Pekoponian emotions can be controlled through the placement of bugs. Keroro insists they use Natsumi as the first test subject! Later, Momoka`s larger-than-life parents duel over which of them gets to participate in the parent-child three-legged race.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mushishi, Search for the Insects! / Momoka, Three-Legged Race!
ムシシ 虫の居所を探せ! / 桃華 争奪! 二人三脚

REGULAR.description:
When Keroro and Fuyuki go looking for buried treasure near Grandma`s house, Keroro suffers a bump that sends him spinning back in time to the Edo period. Later, Tamama is confronted with an almost-exact duplicate of himself, but has to prove that he`s the one and only Private Tamama... if he`s not the fake.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Buried Treasure Special / Tamama Vs. Tamama
ケロロ 埋蔵金スペシャル / タママ 対 タママ

REGULAR.description:
Giroro`s big brother, Galulu, returns to Earth, but this time he`s on vacation. Awkwardness abounds as the two gruff brothers take tentative steps to becoming closer, but can they work together as one to defeat a giant flying mutant potato?

ガルル はた迷惑なバケーション

At Kissho Academy`s annual festival, Fuyuki tries giving a presentation on paranormal powers, but is heckled mercilessly by two self-styled "Occult Busters." Then, Natsumi`s in a bind when many of the actors and stagehands for her class`s production of Romeo and Juliet come down with food poisoning. When Giroro learns that Natsumi herself is playing one of the leads, he agonizes over whether he should step in and take the romantic co-starring role.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki, Occult Culture Festival / Natsumi, Romeo and Juliet?
冬樹 オカルト文化祭 / 夏美 ロミオとジュリエット?

The Shurara Corps has resorted to sending a robo-frog to destroy the Keroro Platoon!  And then Tamama finds a notebook that makes people say whatever he writes in it.  He`s very excited about the power this gives him -- until an apple-eating Kululu starts explaining the rules.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Robobo, Large Mechanized Operations / Tamama, Notebook
ロボボ 機械化大作戦 / タママ ノートですぅ

REGULAR.description:
Thinking it will make a good excuse, Keroro makes up a yokai called "Invasion Goes Nowhere," and blames it for their failure to invade the planet Earth.  But when he starts impersonating said yokai to play pranks on the others in his platoon, he gets an unexpected visitor -- Alisa, who wants to hunt him as one of those that lurk in the darkness!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arisa vs Ghost, Aggression is the Lack of Progress
アリサvs妖怪 侵略が進まない

REGULAR.description:
It`s Labor Thanksgiving Day, and Keroro waits for the platoon to shower him with appreciation for all of his hard work.  But... what`s this?  They want him to show THEM appreciation instead?!  Gero!  And then Keroro makes condiments center stage when his invasion plan centers around them.

titles.title: Keroro, Thanksgiving is a way to work / Keroro, Fight! WakiRanger
ケロロ 勤労を感謝せよ / ケロロ 戦え!ワキレンジャー

REGULAR.description:
Natsumi finds a stuffed toy in the trash that reminds her of a beloved stuffed toy from her childhood.  So she brings it home and fixes it up.  But could that toy actually be part of a trap from the Shurara Corps?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuii, Don`t Abandon Me!
ヌイイ ボクを捨てないで!

REGULAR.description:
Captain Jirara, Dororo`s former superior officer, has gone AWOL from the Keron Army.  Dororo has a suspicion that Captain Jirara is somewhere on Earth, but facing him will require Dororo facing up to his dark past as an assassin in their former platoon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo, Assassin From the Past
ドロロ 過去からの刺客

REGULAR.description:
Giroro has a hard time finding the perfect birthday gift for Natsumi, and once he finally thinks he`s got it, there`s only one left, and he`ll have to fight with a member of the Viper clan over it. Later, Giroro is overcome with jealousy and anxiety when Natsumi leaves home on her birthday, perhaps to meet up with Saburo for a date...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, Target! Present! / Keroro, Big Birthday Party!
ギロロ 目標!プレゼント! / ケロロ 誕生日大パーティー

REGULAR.description:
When Mom is ready to retire their old vacuum cleaner for a new model, vacuum jockey Keroro soups up the machine so the Hinatas will keep it, but maybe Keroro makes it a bit too powerful... Later, Keroro has forgotten the important thing about building plastic models until a mysterious masked figure challenges him to a model-building competition.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, His Lullaby Legend / Keroro, Decisive Plastic Model Battle!
ケロロ あいつとララバイ伝説 / ケロロ プラモ王大決戦!

REGULAR.description:
When Keroro gets irked by a store that`s sold out of a new Gundam model because of Christmas shopping, he takes revenge by wiping out all memories and traces of the special day in Inner-Tokyo, but he still has to neutralize Santa Claus somehow... And on Christmas Day, the Keroro Platoon shrinks itself for a battle royal atop a Christmas cake!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Christmas Prevent! / Keroro Platoon Cake is a Man`s Battlefield!
ケロロ クリスマスを防止せよ! / ケロロ小隊 ケーキは男の戦場だ!

REGULAR.description:
When the Hinatas and the Keroro Platoon visit a shrine on New Year`s Day, Keroro has the perfect visit in mind that will give him guaranteed good luck for the whole year. Later, his plan seems not to have worked as some traditional New Year`s space food he introduces turns out to be sentient and menacing. Can the Hinata family`s traditional New Year`s soup save the day?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, New Years` Shrine Visit without Honor or Humanity / Keroro, Sechira Versus Zonira
ケロロ 仁義なき初詣 / ケロロ セチラ対ゾニラ

Keroro has the brilliant plan of turning toilets into Transformers in order to invade.  Naturally, nothing can go wrong, such as a robot uprising.  And then Kululu seems to have adopted... a puppy?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invasion Plan, Toilet! / Kururu and the Puppy
トイレ 今,立ち上がるとき! / クルル と 子犬

REGULAR.description:
When Keroro suggests going on a skiing vacation, Natsumi accepts readily.  But of course, Aki insists they have to have an adult with them.  And then, just like at Hicksville Beach, it turns out there`s another rare Gundam knock-off that`s going to the winner of a skiing competition!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsumi, I Said I Want to Go Skiing Too! / Keroro, Hot Spring, Tiring Tennis Match!
夏美 私もスキーに連れてって! / ケロロ 温泉っつうたら卓球だ!

REGULAR.description:
It`s another thirteen-episodes-in-one special!  The Keroro Platoon tries to think of lots of strange invasion ideas, Giroro mistakes a "bath" for a "battle," and there`s a special live action segment of the platoon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Special Returns! Gero Gero 30 Minutes, 13 Stories
帰ってきたゲロゲロ30分

REGULAR.description:
In their childhood, Keroro, Giroro, and Zeroro happened upon a matter duplicator.  Keroro forced Zeroro to be duplicated umpteen times, despite his many protests.  Back in the present, the Keroro Platoon is being troubled by holes appearing randomly all over the place.  And it`s caused by... drill-ogres?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zeroro, Multiplying? / Keroro, I Want to Dig Holes!
ゼロロ 増えすぎ? / ケロロ 穴があったら掘りたい!

REGULAR.description:
When Keroro, Giroro, and Zeroro were children, they found some candies that Kululu dropped that made them really small.  And then an overwhelmed Natsumi wishes there was no such thing as obligation chocolate on Valentine`s Day.  Kululu is happy to oblige...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibi Kero, Little-Little Big Adventure! / Natsumi and Momoka, Obligation Chocolate Excluded!
ちびケロ チビチビ大冒険! / 夏美&桃華 義理チョコ禁止!

REGULAR.description:
Kululu becomes a really popular idol.  He takes advantage of it to be even more of a jerk than ever.  And then Keroro decides the platoon needs to return to their roots as invaders... by acting like stereotype villains, complete with costume changes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu, Kururun Idol Legend / Keroro, Resetting My Mind!
クルル クルルンアイドル伝説 / ケロロ 初心に帰る!

REGULAR.description:
After hearing about Leap Day, Keroro gets terrified that a giant monster named Uruu will come to beat all the invaders.  Thanks to his terror, the monster actually appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Uru Has Come!
ケロロ ウルーが来る!

REGULAR.description:
The Keroro Platoon infects Earthlings with a virus that makes them want to clean each others` ears.  And then the girls fight over a magic ball that can make one of their wishes come true.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, the Third of March is Ear Day? / Keroro, It`s Not A Woman`s Fight
ギロロ 3月3日は耳の日? / ケロロ じゃなくて女の戦い

REGULAR.description:
The Shurara Corps sends yet another assassin, Yukiki, to take down the Keroro Platoon.  Then Keroro discovers that he actually has Shurara`s address!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Attack! The Last Worker
ケロロ 激闘! 最後のお仕事人

REGULAR.description:
In this full-length episode, the Keroro Platoon bring out brand-new mech units in a final battle against the vengeful Shurara and his all-powerful Keromet, which has a will of its own and intends to devour Earth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Shurara, Final Brawl!
ケロロ シュララ最終決戦!

REGULAR.description:
556 becomes the Keroro Platoon`s guinea pig by volunteering to be turned into a robot. On the upside, he`ll never go hungry again, but one disadvantage is he`s now under Keroro`s (remote) control. Later, Keroro feels guilty after accidentally breaking Aki`s coffee mug, so he goes out to secretly buy a replacement, which leads to getting caught in the rain and taking shelter under an awning with Natsumi for some reason.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Robo Kogoro / Keroro and Natsumi, Shelter From The Rain
ロボ 556 / ケロロ & 夏美 雨宿り

REGULAR.description:
Keroro accidentally gets on board a train that takes him to a parallel world where he and Fuyuki have never met.  That world`s Fuyuki is ecstatic to meet an alien, while our world`s Fuyuki is wondering sadly where his friend went.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro and Fuyuki, Another World
ケロロ & 冬樹 もう一つの世界

REGULAR.description:
Keroro is in the doldrums at the start of the fifth season until a burst of color reinvigorates all of the platoon members. Later, Keroro has Dororo come up with the first invasion plan of the year, but they`re surprised or just turned off when it involves soybeans fermented with bacteria, or sticky, stinky natto!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Platoon, Start the Color Operation! / Dororo, Do You Like Natto?
ケロロ小隊 色々作戦開始! / ドロロ 納豆はお好き?

REGULAR.description:
Keroro forms a company and has grand plans to make it a success... except he has no idea what kind of work they`re supposed to be doing. Later, Momoka is anxiously awaiting her mostly-absent, globetrotting, street-fighting mother, who promised to visit before the cherry blossoms fell. The problem is, they`ve all but fallen, and Ouka is nowhere in sight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Build A Company! / Mother, Come With Cherry Blossoms
ケロロ 会社を作ろう! / 桜華 桜と共に来る

REGULAR.description:
When an alien computer virus infects the platoon`s secret base, Giroro attempts to go in alone to wipe it out, only to find that he needs backup from an unexpected source. Later, Keroro enacts a nefarious invasion plan to hook the world on his K-Phone, but then discovers that the "almighty phone" has an invasion function...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, A Man`s Backup / Keroro, Mobile Profit Big Plan!
ギロロ オトコのバックアップ / ケロロ お得な携帯大作戦!

REGULAR.description:
A childhood friend of Koyuki`s (and fellow ninja) invites her to join his organization so she can employ her ninja skills to the fullest and really belong somewhere. On the downside, his group is trying to take over the world, which the Keroro Platoon isn`t too happy about when they find out...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koyuki, I`ll Stop Being A Shinobi
小雪 忍び, やめます

REGULAR.description:
Natsumi gets abducted by aliens who feed off confusion energy!  And then Aki accidentally gets turned into a child.  How do they turn her back again?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsumi, Disturbance After School / Aki, Children`s Day
夏美 困惑の放課後 / 秋 子供の日

REGULAR.description:
The entire platoon gets sent to Sengoku Ran Star to find a legendary Keronian treasure.  But the sixth son of the Viper clan is out to stop them.  While undercover as warriors from the Warring States period, can the Keroro Platoon prevail?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Musha Kero, Volume 1: Legendary Hero
武者ケロ 壱の巻 伝説の勇者 でござ候

REGULAR.description:
The platoon goes on a training camp, but Keroro and Giroro are both desperate to find a photograph of Natsumi before she finds it.  Later, Space Inspector K shows up, looking for a terrible space felon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Don`t Look At That! / Kogoro vs. Space Superintendant
ケロロ それだけは見ないで! / 556 vs 宇宙警視

REGULAR.description:
The platoon goes on a training camp, but Keroro and Giroro are both desperate to find a photograph of Natsumi before she finds it.  Later, Space Inspector K shows up, looking for a terrible space felon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, Reclaim Tomorrow!
桃華 明日を取り戻せ!

REGULAR.description:
Kululu suddenly quits the platoon and somehow starts working for Momoka`s father, which is only the beginning of his meteoric rise. Later, when Pururu goes undercover at Natsumi`s sleepover, she seems to inadvertently reveal that she`s in love with one of Keroro`s old friends, which drives Sarge crazy...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu, I Quit / Pururu, Nurse In Love
クルル やめます / プルル 恋する看護兵

REGULAR.description:
When Keroro has Kululu create seven Wettle King replicas to go after Natsumi, a mysterious young man shows up to save her. Later, a Nyoro-Wettle King hybrid takes over the platoon`s space station, prompting the frogs and Hinata siblings to go into space to take it back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Eight Men of the Wettol King / Keroro, Gamma 3`s Big Wet Idea
ケロロ 8人のウェットルキング / ケロロ ガマ3号ウェット大作戦

REGULAR.description:
When Keroro is forced to go through an enormous backlog of unfinished manga, anime, and Gundam models, Kululu helps pick up the pace by introducing the pachyderm-like Compressor-kun, which compresses anything and everything into just the essentials. Later, Fuyuki and Keroro go on a treasure hunt in the house!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Compressed Invasion? / Fuyuki, Legendary Things in The Hinata House
ケロロ 圧縮で侵略? / 冬樹 日向家財宝伝説

REGULAR.description:
Back in their childhood, Zororo gets a copy robot as a gift from his parents.  Naturally, Keroro decides to abuse it.  Returning to the present, a fire scare at the base prompts Keroro to take a fire safety class.  But he gets sold the wrong textbooks, and gets the runaround when he tries to return them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibi Kero, The Forbidden Game / Keroro, Frightening Invaders
ちびケロ 禁じられた遊び / ケロロ 恐怖の侵略者

REGULAR.description:
First, Keroro and his friends in childhood find a broken-down robot that they try to repair.  Then, back in the present, they have to fight a Caries War inside Keroro again!  But something seems funny about these mouth-invaders...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibi Kero, When Your Ear is Stolen / Keroro, Caries War 2
ちびケロ 耳をすませば / ケロロ カリエスウォー2

REGULAR.description:
It`s Volume II of Musha Kero, and there`s a swimsuit comedy contest on Sengoku Ran Star!  Two Viper brothers are teaming up to compete with the Keroro Platoon... and the prize is the next Keronian treasure the frogs have been sent to get!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Musha Kero, Volume 2: Outburst of Laughter, Crushing Comedian War!
武者ケロ 弐の巻 爆笑! 戦国お笑い合戦 でござそうろう

REGULAR.description:
Dororo`s very concerned about global warming, and tries to educate Keroro to be less wasteful to help avert it.  Keroro is not interested in interrupting his conveniences, though.  Then the platoon goes to Egypt to look for an ancient Keronian treasure.  Instead, they wind up waking up Sababa, demon lord of the desert!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, What is Global Warming? / Sababa, Devil King of The Desert
ケロロ 地球温暖化ってなぁに? / サババ 砂漠の魔王

REGULAR.description:
Momoka`s very excited to go out on (what she thinks is) a date with Fuyuki-kun.  Meanwhile, Giroro`s very excited to go out on (what he hopes is) a date with Natsumi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, Decision on Sunday / Giroro, Decision on Sunday
桃華 決戦は日曜日 / ギロロ 決戦は日曜日

REGULAR.description:
The platoon and the Hinata family go to visit Grandma.  But when they arrive, it`s raining!  Grandma teaches them a fun game, and then the platoon comes up with a way to repay her for all the nice things she`s always doing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Fishing Rice Cookies on Rainy Days / Keroro, Memories and Fireworks
ケロロ 雨の日はせんべい釣り! / ケロロ 思い出と花火

REGULAR.description:
Momoka, Natsumi, Koyuki, and two of Natsumi`s friends all get shipwrecked on an uninhabited island.  "Little green fairy" Keroro is not exactly helpful.  Later, the platoon creates a pair of scary red shoes that won`t stop dancing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, Unformed Girl Of An Isolated Island / Keroro, Frightening Red Shoes Mission
桃華 女だらけの無人島 / ケロロ 恐怖の赤い靴作戦

REGULAR.description:
While everyone`s vacationing in Alien Town, Poyon spies them and convinces Natsumi to investigate a crime on her behalf.  All signs seem to point to Keroro... but would he really have pulled off a precious jewel heist?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, That`s Right, Celebrity Resort
ケロロ セレブリゾート捜査網

REGULAR.description:
Tamama`s desperate to jump off the high-dive, but he`s afraid he`s too immature.  Later, Keroro is wandering around thinking he`s a human businessman.  How in the world did this happen?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tamama, Beautiful Dive! / Keroro, The Best Pekoponian Suit
タママ 美しきダイブ! / ケロロ 究極のペコポン人スーツ

REGULAR.description:
Fuyuki finds a little turtle who turns out to be an extremely endangered species from space.  Keroro is super jealous of his new rival for Fuyuki`s affection, which results in him hurting the turtle and going crazy trying to find a way to heal it again.  Meanwhile, an evil gang of three thieves are out to take the turtle back and sell it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki, From a Distant Ocean Came a Turtle
冬樹 遠い海から来たカメ

REGULAR.description:
Keroro wants to teach Natsumi a lesson about how superior he is.  But he makes the mistake of asking for Kululu`s help, resulting in the two of them getting trapped in a dangerous room while Kululu goes out for curry.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro and Natsumi, One Room
ケロロ & 夏美 ひとつの部屋

REGULAR.description:
Intergalactic mail carrier Meruru has a letter for Keroro, but he suspects it`s an ultimatum from Keron Army HQ, so does everything he can to avoid receiving it. Later, after a fight with his sister, Fuyuki joins Keroro on a flying bike ride and they end up at a hidden alien parking area on Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meruru, Postal Service! / Fuyuki, A Break in the Parking Area
メルル 郵便で~す! / 冬樹 パーキングエリアで一服

REGULAR.description:
When sound suddenly disappears all over Inner-Tokyo, Keroro comes up with a way to use the situation for the invasion. Later, Saburo and Kululu discover what`s behind the enforced silence, and they are the only ones who can bring sound back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Killer Fist of Words! / Saburo and Kululu, Silent Fight
ケロロ コトバの必殺拳! / サブロー & クルル 静かな戦い

REGULAR.description:
Mindful that her mega-expensive plans to capture Fuyuki`s heart never succeed, Momoka gives Paul a budget of just 300 yen to come up with something that will bring her together with Fuyuki. And before Dororo became Dororo, he was Zeroro on Keron. One day, a robot appears out of nowhere to save Zeroro from peril and from then on, they live together... until the Keron army gets wind of it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, Big Operation: Love Savings / Zeroro, I Finally Found Kikaka
桃華 愛の節約作戦 / ゼロロ キカカがやってきた

REGULAR.description:
The Keroro Platoon continues its top-secret mission on the planet Sengoku Ran. This time they try to rescue Princess Momo before she`s forced to marry a Viper, with explosive results!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Musha Kero: Volume 3, Big Explosion, Close Call For Princess Momo
武者ケロ 参の巻 大爆発 桃姫危機一髪!! でござそうろう

REGULAR.description:
Keroro`s board gets stolen, and he`s devastated.  But when he goes out searching for it, he discovers Mecha Viper, of all people!  Since the platoon`s developed superpowers, they decide to take on Mecha Viper in their most epic battle yet!  (They think...)
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Board Robbing / Keroro, Heroes
ケロロ ボードロボー / ケロロ ひ~ろ~ず

REGULAR.description:
Aki`s been chosen as the replacement editor for a new mangaka at work, and he`s having trouble telling stories with energy.  She brings him home to meet Keroro and the rest of the platoon -- because the frogs are bursting with energy!  Too bad it seems to drive the poor mangaka crazy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aki, A Little Over Than Editor!
秋 編集者は強し!

REGULAR.description:
Kululu invents a telop machine that makes whatever you write on the screen of the show come true!  After having fun tormenting Natsumi, Keroro declares this is the perfect tool to use to invade the Earth.  But no one can agree about how to use it!  Later, they find a how-to book about invasions.  It was written by Urere, so it has to be useful!  Right?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, TV Projector Big Plan / Keroro, Invade By How-To Book
ケロロ テロップ大作戦 / ケロロ ハウツー本で侵略

REGULAR.description:
Sassie, the plesiosaur of Lake Sashida, was long ago denounced as a fraud.  But a new witness has come forth claiming to have seen it, and Fuyuki can hardly wait to learn if it`s true!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki and The Plesiosaur
冬樹 と 首長竜

REGULAR.description:
The new Pekoponian invasion plan calls for mass distribution of Kululu-created bubble gum that causes various annoying effects like weightlessness and the compulsion to litter (and then step on it). Later on, after the platoon gathers mushrooms, a witch hunt ensues to find the Keronian who ate a poisonous mushroom that will turn him into a contagious Mushroom Man.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Chewing Gum? / Tamama, Tamama Tango
ケロロ ガム噛む? / タママ タママタンゴ

REGULAR.description:
The Musha Kero Platoon sets out to find the fourth ancient weapon and run into Mutsuzo, a Mutsumi lookalike who longs to be a manga artist but has no talent whatsoever. Meanwhile, another Musha Viper shows up with his giant robot to plunder and wreak havoc.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Musha Kero, Volume 4: Go West, Musha Kero Platoon
武者ケロ 四の巻 武者ケロ小隊 西へ!! でござそうろう

REGULAR.description:
When the Keroro Platoon participates in a quiz show hosted by Dasonu Maso, they learn the value of teamwork... or is it every frog for himself? Later, Keroro and company are annoyed when the pacifistic Dororo shoots down even their mildest plans to invade Pekopon, so they change his personality to be more agreeable, but (naturally) get more than they asked for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Attack! Hint Age Difference Ultra Hammer / Dororo, Big Change!
ケロロ アタック! ヒントで年の差ウルトラハンマー / ドロロ 大改造!

REGULAR.description:
When Natsumi spots Koyuki and Saburo together, she comes to the conclusion that they`re dating, and goes batty. Later, Keron Army HQ tries to set up Chief Nurse Pururu with a potential suitor. Pururu isn`t really interested, but Keroro gets in the way by trying to help Pururu land this "big tuna."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsumi, Is it a Love Triangle? / Pururu, Big Marriage Meeting Plan!
夏美 もしかして三角関係? / プルル お見合い大作戦!

REGULAR.description:
Kululu and Saburo seem to have something up their sleeves.  Keroro`s afraid Kululu is reporting about them to HQ, and Giroro`s afraid it has something to do with Natsumi!  And then Fuyuki wants a new video game, but his mother won`t let him stand in line outside to get a limited-edition copy.  So Keroro goes in his place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu, Excellent Sergeant Major / Keroro, Morning of Legends
クルル 特命曹長 / ケロロ 伝説の朝

REGULAR.description:
556 requests Keroro`s help in protecting him from "them."  He seems extremely paranoid, and won`t explain what`s going on.  Then Kululu turns the vacuum cleaner, among other household appliances, into a human.  Strange things happen at the Hinata house as a result!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 556 今は言えない / ケロロ 掃除機よ永遠なれ!
Kogoro, Now I Can`t Tell You / Keroro, Cleaning Eternally!

REGULAR.description:
Keroro finds a strange warped crawl space that allows him to play pranks by dangling over Natsumi and Giroro`s ceilings.  Later, he has the good idea of invading by making everyone on Earth think they`re being watched constantly.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Ceiling Walker / Keroro, Self-Consciousness Invasion
ケロロ 屋根裏の散歩者 であります / ケロロ 自意識過剰で侵略! であります

REGULAR.description:
Keron Army HQ has sent the Keroro Platoon a Christmas present... of Kiruru, the deadly robot!  The Keroro Platoon has to go up against him to try to save the Earth from being destroyed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, The Battlefield is a Merry Christmas
ケロロ 戦場はメリークリスマス

REGULAR.description:
Keroro is cleaning the bathrooms when he discovers a bunch of graffiti that writes itself.  Talking with them, he meets the graffiti-dwellers, and even becomes one of them!  But then he`s left all alone over New Year`s.  It`s not quite fun being flat when he can`t even invade his favorite show on TV!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Graffiti Dweller / Keroro, Great Tumult Through Another Year
ケロロ 落書きの住人 であります / ケロロ 年越し大騒動 であります

REGULAR.description:
Keroro has the perfect first dream of the new year to herald a successful invasion, so he immediately decides to throw a party to celebrate their imminent success.  Spending the entire budget on the first day must be a great idea!  Then 556 scratches his helmet, and he goes to Kululu to get his personality (and helmet) new and improved.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, New Year Invasion Plans! / Kogoro, Scratched Helmet
ケロロ 初侵略作戦! であります / 556 傷ついたヘルメット であります

REGULAR.description:
Giroro is so desperate to learn how to gargle, he has Kululu inject him with a space virus that he`ll catch if he doesn`t learn it, quick!  And then Keroro decides to make Keroro Platoon collectible erasers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, Special Gargling Training! / Keroro, Kero-Eraser!
ギロロ うがい猛特訓! / ケロロ ケロ消し

REGULAR.description:
Mois gets some lipstick as a sample, and she`s excited that it makes her look and feel more adult.  Later, Kululu`s lab gets trashed and the base gets attacked by scary giant robots!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mois, Lipstick Slapstick / Keroro, Get Out! Keron Bar Field
モア リップスティック・スラップスティック であります / ケロロ 脱出! ケロンバーフィールド であります

REGULAR.description:
When a newborn baby alien shows up in Keroro`s bed, he takes care of it, even as the baby becomes huge and eats up the year`s invasion budget. Later, after Momoka`s bodyguard Yoshiokadaira loses his confidence on the job, the Keroro Platoon restores it and then some with eyedrops that turn the young man into a delusional megalomaniac.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Don`t Call Me Mama / Masayoshi Yoshiokadaira: That Delusion is Mine!
ケロロ ママと呼ばないで であります / 吉岡平正義 妄想するは我にあり! であります

REGULAR.description:
Keroro and company infiltrate Musha Viper Goemon`s fortress to find the final legendary weapon, while Dororo duels with fellow ninja (and Koyuki lookalike) Yukino, who stole the first four crystals from the platoon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Musha Kero, Volume 5: Keronian of the Hidden Fortress
武者ケロ・伍の巻 隠し砦ケロン人 でござ候

REGULAR.description:
The climax of Musha Kero is here, as the Keroro Platoon fights the monster Nanamata-no-Orochi with the five pieces of the ultimate weapon and uncover the secret of what they all do together!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Musha Kero, Volume 6: The Revived Hero!
武者ケロ・六の巻 蘇る勇者 でござ候

REGULAR.description:
556 finds a cute little critter in a storage unit, and he and Lavie adopt it as a pet named 5884.  Meanwhile, Keroro is looking for the oil-eating monster he ordered to use for a Pekoponian invasion...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 556と5884! であります
Kogoro and Kobayashi!

REGULAR.description:
Keroro experiences the annoyances, and joys, of seeing a movie in a movie theater.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Let`s Go to the Movies!
ケロロ 映画に行こう!

REGULAR.description:
Keroro becomes a hulking super-frog in order to intimidate Natsumi. Later, when Keroro becomes the victim of a phone scam, Kululu creates an analog phone robot to help track down the culprit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, The Incredible Keroro / Keroro, Black-Phone Investigator 66
ケロロ 超人ケロロ であります / ケロロ 黒電話捜査官66 であります

REGULAR.description:
When Fuyuki`s mom accidentally buys him boxers instead of briefs, he finds himself agonizing over which one he`d rather be wearing.  Then Galulu shows up, and... it looks like he`s going to confess his feelings to Pururu?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki, Trunks versus Briefs / Garuru, Obscured Feelings!?
冬樹 トランクス対ブリーフ / ガルル 密かなる想い!?

REGULAR.description:
Keroro has devised three similarly diabolical plans to take over Pekopon! There`s no way they`ll backfire, right?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Frightening Darkness Plan!/Keroro, Frightening Whiteness Plan / Keroro, Frightening Time-Stop Plan!
ケロロ 恐怖の大暗黒作戦! であります / ケロロ 恐怖の大美白作戦! であります / ケロロ 恐怖の大停止作戦! であります

REGULAR.description:
After years of lying low, the Keroro Platoon finally invade Earth for real! If this is a joke, it`s a really bad one!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki and Natsumi, Keroro Invasion! / Keroro, That`s a Lie
冬樹&夏美 ケロロ襲来! であります / ケロロ ウッソだよ~ん♪ であります

REGULAR.description:
On Keron, the Keroro Platoon`s exploits are dramatized into the popular show, "Keroro Platoon War Chronicle," but Keron Army HQ wants the platoon to remake the very first episode of the long-running series. Keroro and company work on a version where they all invade the Hinata house together, but their creative collaboration quickly hits the rocks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, First Encounter Revisited!
ケロロ 第一話改訂! であります

REGULAR.description:
An invasion plan backfires, leaving Keroro paralyzed by negative feelings... so paralyzed that he can`t do any of his regular chores at the Hinata house. Later, Keroro and company are at a grilled meat restaurant, but when it turns out they`ve only got enough money for one person`s meal, they split it five ways, which sets in motion a test of wills!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Negative Thinking of Terror / Keroro, Grilled Meat Without Dignity
ケロロ 恐怖のネガティヴシンキング であります / ケロロ 仁義なき焼肉 であります

REGULAR.description:
Koyuki guides Natsumi and the others to her former village in search of cherry blossoms that are still in bloom. They find a bevy of the unexpected, though, from a phantom girl to a ticked-off dragon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koyuki, Cherry Blossom Trouble!
小雪 サクラ大変! であります

REGULAR.description:
In this flashback episode, it`s time for the Keroro Platoon to meet for the first time, but Keroro`s gotten himself, Giroro, and Zeroro locked in their old clubhouse!  Afterwards, it`s time for the Keroro Platoon`s first mission, with Keroro having forgotten the Kero Ball.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kero Zero, Keroro Platoon`s Departure Last Night / Kero Zero, Keroro Platoon`s First Mission
ケロゼロ ケロロ小隊出発前夜 であります / ケロゼロ ケロロ小隊ファーストミッション であります

REGULAR.description:
Momoka is desperate to win the seat next to Fuyuki when the class shuffles seats around.  Later, an alien discovers that nothing can erase 556`s feelings for his sister... or his beloved storage units!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, The Big Seat Change Plan / Kogoro, My Feelings!
桃華 席替え大作戦 であります / 556 オレの想い! であります

REGULAR.description:
Bariri`s back, and he`s still in love with Pururu!  This makes it particularly awkward, since he`s injured and she`s his nurse.  Then Keroro`s mother comes to visit, and he finds her embarrassing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bariri, Loving Chief Medic / Keroro, Looking Up In the Sky, Mother
バリリ 愛しの看護長 であります / ケロロ 空を見上げりゃお袋さん であります

REGULAR.description:
A wish-granting weevil shows up at Keroro`s doorstep and promises to grant his wish if he`ll just fulfill all the conditions.  But what could Keroro`s wish be?  Then Natsumi falls in love with an adorable pet trash bag Kululu invented.  Something so cute can`t possibly be dangerous, right?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Weevil That Grants Dreams / Keroro, Do Your Best, Trash Bag!
ケロロ 夢をかなえるゾウムシ であります / ケロロ がんばれゴミ袋! であります

REGULAR.description:
As television switches from analog to digital, a monster sweeps down upon Earth to take over the minds of anyone using digital devices.  Only old-fashioned analog attacks can defeat it!  And then, in punishment for keeping so many of his Gundam models in boxes, Keroro gets turned into one himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Eliminate the Space Digital Monster! / Keroro, Transform
ケロロ 宇宙デジタル怪獣襲来! であります / ケロロ 変身 であります

REGULAR.description:
Natsumi and Saburo are going on a date, and Giroro can`t bear it!  He has a remote control that can control Natsumi`s behavior that he confiscated from Keroro... can he keep the self-control to refrain from using it?!  Later, Keroro tells Natsumi and Fuyuki about a time his platoon was stranded on an alien planet and raised a pet in order to eat it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, Remote-Controlled Date / Keroro, Pu`s Doubts
ギロロ リモコンでデート であります / ケロロ プーがいた洞窟 であります

REGULAR.description:
Tamama gets the disturbing idea into his head that if he kisses Keroro to wake him up, Keroro will be all "lovey-dovey" for him.  As Keroro flees in abject horror from Tamama`s grotesque, oversized lips, everybody but Keroro winds up getting the smooch treatment.  Afterwards, Mois discovers a wrinkle on Pururu`s face, and she can`t bring herself to say anything.  Everyone in the platoon is cringing and trying not to bring it up during their checkups with the nurse.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tamama, That Wake-Up Kiss is Mine / Pururu, Revealed Secret?!
タママ 目覚めのキッスは僕のもの であります / プルル ばれちゃった秘密?! であります

REGULAR.description:
Keroro`s latest devious plan to invade Pekopon involves flooding the world with Cybercaps, headgear that lets the wearer experience whatever they wish in the safety of virtual space. Later, Keroro bonds with a clerk at a toy store over Gundam models and they become fast friends. Or are they more than friends?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Big Air One Way or Another Operation / Keroro, Return to the Motel
ケロロ エアなんとか大作戦! であります / ケロロ モテる であります

REGULAR.description:
In another prequel tale set on the Keron Army mothership heading to Earth, when Keroro and company pursue a renegade Pekoponian collaborator, they end up stranded on a desolate planet with a nasty creature for company.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kero Zero, Enter Pekoponian Mecha Designer Kiko Katoyama
ケロゼロ ペコポン人デザイナーカトヤマ・キコ登場 であります

REGULAR.description:
When Momoka gets a love potion from Kululu with which to woo Fuyuki, she fails to follow the fine print, causing chaotic declarations of love. Later, space mold takes over Natsumi`s body, and only Keroro can save her by shrinking down and going in deep.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, Big Happy Digging Idea / Giroro, Escape From Natsumi!
桃華 ホレたハレたの大騒動 であります / ギロロ 夏美からの脱出! であります

REGULAR.description:
The latest invasion plan goes slightly off course when Fuyuki is accidentally hit with a de-aging ray, turning him into the rambunctious little kid he used to be. But he`s in good company, as Keroro, Giroro, and Dororo turn themselves into half-pint sized versions of themselves, too. They all get along until Li`l Fuyuki challenges Li`l Keroro for the position of platoon commander.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibi Kero vs. Chibi Fuyuki
ちびケロVSちび冬樹 であります

REGULAR.description:
The Keroro Platoon`s getting a new member, and Tamama`s excited to be a senpai.  But then the new member is... Joriri?!  Then Natsumi accidentally gets turned into a boy for a day, and discovers just how awkward that can be.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tamama, It`s Hard Being an Upperclassman / Natsumi, We`re All Boys!
タママ 先輩はつらいよ であります / 夏美 僕たち男の子! であります

REGULAR.description:
The Wettle King is back, and he`s dying in the summer heat!  He`s fallen for a beautiful girl with antennae who saved him with a wet handkerchief, but who could that girl be?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wettol King versus Kogoro / Three Weirdos, Smallest Showdown on Pekopon
ウェットルキング対556! / 三大怪人 ペコポン最小の決戦

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious boy from space lands in the Hinata household.  He has no memory of who he is, but the answer might be surprising.  Then the Hinata siblings and the platoon go back to Hicksville Beach for a comedy contest... again... but this time, Dasonu Maso decides to enter!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Training is OK / Koyuki, Confrontation! Midsummer`s Shore
ケロロ 仕込みはOK であります / 小雪 対決! 真夏の海岸 であります

REGULAR.description:
Wilting in the terrible summer heat, Keroro asks for Kululu`s help.  Kululu, of course, is happy to oblige, and gets the platoon a tremendous floating island of ice to relax on.  But Keroro isn`t content with just relaxing, once he realizes he can have even more...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Platoon, Keroro of Silence!
ケロロ小隊 沈黙のケロロ!

After that, they get an exercise machine that`s booby-trapped from Viper, and Keroro has to figure out WHICH Viper in order to save his friends!

titles.title: Keroro, Keron-Style Golf / Keroro, Run Keroro
ケロロ ケロン式ゴルフ / ケロロ 走れケロロ

Grandma comes to visit, and Kululu changes places with her?!  Then Giroro goes out on a date with Keroro`s-mother-in-Natsumi`s-body, while Natsumi-in-Keroro`s-mother`s-body gets dragged off to a hot spring with Keroro`s father.
Source: crunchyroll

ケロロ 提督殿強襲! であります / ギロロ チャックはそのままで! であります

titles.title: Kero Zero, Space Catering / Kero Zero, Formula for Eating
ケロ0 宇宙で出前 であります / ケロ0 食べたい方程式 であります

The Ghost Girl doesn`t feel she`s scary enough, so she asks the Keroro Platoon for a makeover.  Then Giroro gets mistaken for a handsome Prince Charming when he saves one of Natsumi`s friends from a monster!

幽霊ちゃん ビフォーアフター であります / ギロロ 赤い妖精 であります

Alisa comes to visit, and she doesn`t understand why Fuyuki`s upset.  Keroro explains that it`s because his mother is busy with work and can`t go on the picnic she`d planned with them.  Alisa takes it upon herself to "motivate" the slacker mangaka who`s taking up all her time and terrify the man back on track.  Maybe not the best thing for Fuyuki`s mother!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alisa`s First Time as a Mama!?
アリサ 初めてのママ!?

Keroro and Natsumi battle at the supermarket over redeeming a point card for a prize. Later, Keroro has a lucid dream in which he`s a giant robot that achieves popularity until being overshadowed by newer models.

ケロロ&夏美 仁義無きスタンプカードであります / ケロロ 悲しみのケロボット であります

The Keroro Platoon transforms themselves into cicadas to "bug" Natsumi and Fuyuki, but come up against a competing alien threat to invade the planet. Later, Keroro and company enjoy Kero Day, in which the whole universe but Earth celebrates Keronians.

titles.title: Keroro, Cicada Platoon / Keroro, Ribbit Day
ケロロ セミ小隊 / ケロロ ケーローの日

This episode has the backstory of how Momoka fell in love with Fuyuki in the first place.  Also, how the Keroro Platoon got picked as the Special Advance Team of the invasion of Earth!

桃華 突然炎のごとく / ケロ0 イチジク戦線の思い出

Having seen the movie Twelve Angry Men, Keroro is hoping to be the only person on the jury to convince the others that Giroro isn`t guilty.  But when everyone unanimously agrees that he isn`t, Keroro switches strategies... to change his verdict to "guilty"!  Later on, a dinosaur appears on Earth, only to discover that his species is extinct and has been replaced by humans.
Source: crunchyroll

ケロロ 5人の呆れるケロン人 / 冬樹 人間の惑星

When an ambitious Keronian major takes command of Keroro Platoon, the first order of business is kicking Dororo out for his pacifistic ways. Then the major unveils his plan to wipe out all of the continents...

ドロロ さらば小隊

A pair of usurping invaders show up on Earth to take the invasion away from the Keroro Platoon.  But they are accidentally foiled by Hinata Aki. Source: crunchyroll

秋 地球防衛最前線! / 夏美 緊迫! 授業参観

When Keroro has Kululu come up with a spray that causes people to spill things carelessly, the roundabout invasion plan works too well, causing problematic spillages for everyone in the platoon, too. titles.title: Keroro, Careless Saturated Operation! / Keroro, Invasion! Softglon of Terror
ケロロ うっかりビチョビチョ大作戦! であります / ケロロ 侵略! 恐怖のソフトグロン であります

When Natsumi has a stubborn case of hiccups, Keroro and company do everything they can to help stop it. Then it`s back in time with Kero Zero. As the Keroro Platoon trains on a supposedly deserted planet, they hear a young woman singing...

titles.title: Natsumi, Stop Those Hiccups / Kero Zero, Awaited Person of the Training Planet
夏美 しゃっくり止めて~ / ケロ0 訓練惑星の待ち人

Keroro is pretending to be a kappa at a village in order to get gifts of starfruit and Gundam models.  But what happens when the platoon and Momoka find out that he`s really an imposter when they all go hunting for the kappa?

titles.title: Keroro, Kappa Legend / Keroro, Welcome Back
ケロロ カッパ伝説 / ケロロ おかえりなさい

It`s a documentary with Giroro`s backstory!  And then Kululu builds a satellite that makes everyone`s lies come true.  The consequences are both useful and terrifying.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, Red Devil of the Battlefield / Keroro, is That Really a Lie?
ギロロ 戦場の赤い悪魔 / ケロロ そのウソ, ホント?

Space Officer Poyon comes to Earth for a tete-a-tete with Paul the super-butler, and the Keroro Platoon has to help arrange it, or they`ll all be arrested. Then in a Kero Zero tale, the platoon discovers an unknown planet covered in snow on the way to Earth. titles.title: Poyon, Miracle Paul Operation! / Kero Zero, Snow is a Merciless Queen of the Night
ポヨン ポールにミラクル大作戦! / ケロ0 雪は無慈悲な夜の女王

Alisa and Nevula join the Hinata-Keroro Platoon hot spring outing, but Nevula has separation anxiety when the wooden wall separating the male and female baths keeps him from his "daughter." titles.title: Alisa & Nevula, First Hot Spring / Keroro Platoon, Struggle! Torinoichi
アリサ&ネブラ 初めての温泉 / ケロロ小隊 奮闘! 酉の市

Pairs of aliens suddenly start showing up in Natsumi`s bedroom, and they`re especially interested in her bottom drawer... Later, Keroro wakes up into a dream and he`s not alone. Natsumi and his platoon are also there, and they`re trapped with seemingly no way out.

夏美 タンスの秘密 / ケロロ 夢の中に君がいて

It`s thirteen short stories packed within one episode (yet again)!  This time, we find out what Fuyuki`s childhood dream was, where Saburo(?) lives, and whether feng shui really works in an invasion.  Also, an all-butler party, and Fuyuki`s forced to stay the night at Momoka`s house!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Again Gero Gero 30 Minutes
またまたゲロゲロ30分

Yoshiokadaira wants to quit Momoka`s bodyguard!  But why?  And then Natsumi desperately wants to invite Saburo-senpai to her Christmas party, but she can`t figure out how.  Why is she such a chicken?!

titles.title: Yoshiokadaira, Bodyguard Elegy / Natsumi, Christmas Meeting Operation
吉岡平 親衛隊哀歌(エレジー) / 夏美 クリスマス会大作戦

Keroro tries fusing bodies with all of the other platoon members, but it doesn`t end quite as he expected it to.  Then he buys a giant mech for only 135 yen, convinced that it`s the ultimate invasion weapon!

ケロロ 二人が一人ケロロ~ム! / ケロロ 謎の最終兵器

ケロロ 新年早々ラッキー / ケロロ 今年はケロン年!

Keroro trains himself to have an iron will by shunning video recording and focusing on the moment... when his favorite TV shows are on. Later, a Dangal snow sculpture comes to life and has one wish, to see the life-sized Dangal statue in Inner-Tokyo, over a hundred miles away!

titles.title: Keroro, Just One Chance / Dangale Lands
ケロロ チャンスは一度! / ダンガル 大地に立つ

When Mois unleashes Armageddon upon Earth for real, Keroro is obliged to try and stop her, especially since he accidentally encouraged the Great Lord of Terror. モア さよならペコポン / サブロー 謎多き少年
