A horrifying creature euphemistically called a "G" appears in the Hinata house.  They must destroy the unspeakable horror before it multiples and spreads its species over the entire property!  Even worse, what if the Gs have sentience and can take revenge?!

titles.title: Giroro, Take Down G-Force! / Giroro, G-Force`s Counterattack
ギロロ Gを倒せ! / ギロロ Gの逆襲

A Keronian from many generations ago wakes up from a long hibernation in his spaceship after crash-landing on Earth. titles.title: Onono, Illusionary Keron Soldier
オノノ 幻のケロン兵

タママ 西澤家追放? / 桃華 愛と悲しみのチョコケーキ

Keroro takes over the directing of a movie about the platoon, to the disaster of all involved!  And then, Keroro finds out about a legendary movie coming back to a theater, and he and Fuyuki go into the city to watch it together.

ケロロ 我輩は監督ぢゃよ! / ケロロ&冬樹 大都会の小さな冒険

When the Keroro Platoon gets sent back in time to Pekopon, they find out their friend Kiko`s backstory: how she got abducted off Earth, and how she became a mech designer.

titles.title: Kero Zero, I am From Pekopon
ケロ0 故郷はペコポン

When an untimely wind blows Keroro`s hat off of the laundry line, it ends up in the hands of a little girl in the neighborhood. Keroro tries to get it back, which is a major challenge since she can now turn invisible with the anti-barrier, while Keroro is visible to everyone and everything.

ケロロ それだけは返してちょーだい!

ノビビ が来た!

Guardian Spirits come to help Keroro and Dororo! But is it really the kind of help they need?

しゅごケロ どっきどきパーティー! / ドロロ ドロ郎がくる!

ケロロ & 冬樹 タイムカプセルの夜

Keroro has a nightmare about something interfering with the ultimate invasion.  What could it be?

ケロロ 第三惑星の悪夢 / ケロロ 夜のケロロ軍曹

When Keroro hits on a new way to slack off, Giroro gets to take command of the invasion plans for a day. ギロロ ペコポン侵略開始! / ギロロ&夏美 携帯メール作戦

タママ お菓子の王国 / 桃華 お世話になります

The Keroro Platoon has the horrifying realization that it`s Kululu`s turn to come up with an invasion.  They have to stop him, at all costs! クルル 侵略は始じまっている / ケロロ ケロいい話!

Something strange has happened to Dororo: he seems to have turned back into the scary Assassin he used to be!  Later, Koyuki seems to have a scary secret.  Her friends all gather together to spy on her and figure out what it is!

ドロロ 侵略こそ我が使命! / 小雪 のヒ・ミ・ツ....

ケロロ 侵略達成翌日 / 秋 侵略者になる

ケロロ 裸の侵略者 であります/夏美&サブロー 昼休みの空 であります

Havoc is wreaked when a parasitic space flower takes root on Keroro`s head and starts spewing out Keroro clones. Later, Fuyuki has to capture his renegade shadow before he fades out of existence!

ケロロ 楽しい園芸 であります / 冬樹 いつかの影ふみ であります

Momoka accidentally switches bodies with... Keroro?!  And then Keroro decides that Natsumi and Fuyuki deserve to be reminded, in black-and-white, B-movie terms, that the platoon is made up of alien invaders from outer space.

桃華 私は軍曹? であります / ケロロ 宇宙からの侵略者作戦 であります

Viper (master of disguise) shows up on Earth, looking to attack Keroro!  And so the platoon leader desperately tries to figure out which person in the Hinata household is him.  After that, Giroro gets trapped in Natsumi`s upper closet.  How will he ever escape without getting noticed?!

ケロロ ヴァイパーを捜せ! であります / ギロロ 天袋の中の戦士 であります

Keroro and company do everything they can to get the masked Dororo to show his mouth, a sight they`ve never seen before. Later, Mois`s pen pal from space visits her on Earth and intends to carry out an old promise to help her friend destroy the planet.

titles.title: Dororo Kamen no Otoko de Arimasu

ドロロ 仮面の男 であります / モア 黒い来訪者 であります

An alien virus jumps from Mois`s laptop to the underground base`s mainframe and then really wreaks havoc! Then a sentient antique clock from space arrives for Keroro. To help the kindly clock regain its memories, Kululu participates in a tense black market auction.

titles.title: Moa Tensai Hacker? de Arimasu

モア 天才ハッカー? であります / クルル 小さな古時計 であります

The frogs decide to try becoming super-hot humanoid men in order to tempt Natsumi to consent to their invading.  It almost works.  Later, Bariri shows up yet again in order to try to convince Pururu to marry him.

夏美 憧れの侵略者! であります / プルル 六月の花嫁!? であります

Keroro decides older things are better, and turns everyone`s stuff into old-fashioned versions!  (Dororo sobs because he`s unaffected.)  Later on, Natsumi is being suspiciously nice to Keroro.  What possible reason could there be?!

ケロロ 古きに学べ であります / 夏美 優しさは罪 であります

Giroro`s test flight of a new spaceship has run into a terrible danger, and he`s afraid he`ll never make it back safely again.  Worse, Natsumi`s towel apparently slipped, and his video feed wasn`t on to see it!

titles.title: Giroro, Impossible Escape?! / Keroro, Impossible Rescue?!
ギロロ 脱出不可能?! であります / ケロロ 救出不可能?! であります

When Keroro`s left home, he appreciates it at first, but then finds that having the run of the Hinata house isn`t all it`s cracked up to be. Later, when Natsumi borrows a Kero Ball to use as a video camera for a contest, she soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous combat cameraman training simulation... inside the ball itself.

titles.title: Keroro, Advent of the Space Chief of House-Sitting / Natsumi, Cameraman Training Battlefield!
ケロロ 宇宙お留守番長降臨 であります / 夏美 戦場カメラマン大訓練! であります

Natsumi finds herself plagued with a plethora of "Do Not Push" buttons. How long can she hold out before pushing one of them? Later, the Keroro Platoon enters the Kero Ball in order to rescue Natsumi and Fuyuki from a mind-boggling invader level check quiz.

夏美 押すな! であります / ケロロ 侵略者度チェック であります

The Keroro Platoon doesn`t seem to be noticeable enough to the Hinatas -- so they paint themselves in crazy Gundam model colors in order to become more noticeable.  Then Keroro has an invasion plan that involves turning human makeup crazy!

ケロロ, バージョンアップモデル であります / ケロロ お化粧するは我にあり であります

The platoon recalls a time back on Keron when they had to sneak Zeroro out of his house so they could all see fireworks together. Later, the Hinata siblings, the Keroro Platoon, and friends return once again to Hicksville Beach, where a new nighttime swimsuit beauty contest is going to be held, and Natsumi (with a temporary adult body) is yet again participating!

titles.title: Chibi Kero, Fireworks from the Summer / Keroro, Swimsuit Beauties Contest!
ちびケロ あの夏の花火 であります / ケロロ 水着美女コンテスト! であります

REGULAR.description:
After Keroro is mistaken for a superhero, he lives up to the misconception, becoming the neighborhood do-gooder... until his heroism clashes with an invading flying tank that Keroro designed himself! Later, another invasion plan goes awry, trapping the Keroro Platoon in a state of frozen time.

titles.title: Keroro, Super Hero! / Keroro, Invasion in a Blink!
ケロロ 正義の味方! であります / ケロロ あっという間の侵略! であります

Momoka decides to try to be normal... but she has no idea what that is!  And then Paul takes a day off, and starts doing some really suspicious things.

桃華 普通にしやがれ! であります / ポール の休日 であります

Fuyuki`s having dinner with Momoka`s father, and he notices the man has an extremely long nose hair.  He doesn`t know how to mention it without making the man angry!  And then they all go to Hisquesviel Planet, and Natsumi loses the top of her swimsuit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki Worried! / Natsumi, the Ocean Isn`t Large or Big
冬樹 気になる! であります / 夏美 海は広いな大きいな であります

REGULAR.description:
Natsumi asks Giroro to house-sit while she`s out, but then he winds up having to house-sit with 556, the worst house-sitting partner ever!  Later, Koyuki convinces Kululu to teach her how to make curry, to his horror.

titles.title: 556 史上最凶の相棒 であります / 小雪 初めてのカレー であります
556, Unluckiest Partner / Koyuki, First Curry

REGULAR.description:
Keroro hatches a plan to convert Natsumi`s anger into energy for the invasion... or is it just an excuse for him to slack off? Then, a misunderstanding over the expression "dessert stomach" leads the platoon to take desperate measures to get their own version of this "secret weapon."

titles.title: Natsumi, One Week Without Anger / Keroro, Invasion is a Second Stomach?
夏美 怒ってはいけない一週間 であります / ケロロ 侵略はベツバラ? であります

Fuyuki`s excited when they find a Mothman-like creature in the forest.  Then, an uninvited "guest" appears: a deserter from the Keron Army!

冬樹 蝶人出現? であります / ギロロ 招かれざる客 であります

REGULAR.description:
When Momoka invites Fuyuki to an abandoned planetarium, he becomes possessed by the spirit of an old projector! Then, Keroro has a single wild hair growing on top of his head, which he cultivates after Fuyuki tells him it`s a "lucky hair."

titles.title: Momoka, Mood of the Starry Sky / Keroro, Little Hair of Luck
桃華 星空の気持ち であります / ケロロ 福毛ちゃん であります

Saburo and Keroro bet the Earth on whether the human or the frog team can win a bowling match!  And then Keroro`s dismayed by his platoon`s lack of enthusiasm about the regular invasion meeting, so he turns into a giant monster to go on a rampage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Clash, Star Circular Violence Tool Tournament / Keroro, My Super Decisive Plan!?
ケロロ 激突☆暴輪具(スタアボウリング)大会 であります / ケロロ 我輩, 超決断計画!? であります

REGULAR.description:
Wanting to come up with a brilliant invasion plan without interruptions, Keroro uses a cheap, discount copy robot to take his place!  Later, he and the platoon fulfill the rash promise made by that robot to take the Hinata family up to the moon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Leader Representative Robot Launches! / Keroro, the Moon is Luxurious
ケロロ 隊長代理ロボ出動! であります / ケロロ 月は豪華だ! であります

REGULAR.description:
Zolulu, the assassin who considers himself Dororo`s arch-enemy, traps the rest of the Keroro Platoon so they can`t interfere as he engages Dororo in a duel to the death. Then Keroro tricks Natsumi into letting him "borrow" the house for a day. It`s for a TV show and involves the platoon making some renovations, which Natsumi doesn`t mind, until she learns the hard way that they`re of the "home defense" kind!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo, Ninja Approaching the Shadow / Natsumi, Exploration of the Construction of the Hinata Residence
ドロロ 忍び寄る影 であります / 夏美 日向家建物探訪 であります

REGULAR.description:
Super-intelligent mice have invaded the house!  And then, Keroro tries transforming Giroro into a cow as part of an invasion operation.  But Giroro being male, he turns into a {\i0}bull{\i1}... a terrifying minotaur-like creature, to be exact.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Flowers for Algernainon / Giroro, Oh! Ferocious Ox
ケロロ アルジャナイノンに花束を であります / ギロロ Oh! モウギュウ であります

REGULAR.description:
Koyuki makes a new friend on Halloween... one of those who lurk in the dark, who Alisa is hunting as her latest prey!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koyuki, Day of Halloween / Koyuki vs Alisa, Duel of the Ocean Depths
小雪 ハロウィンの日 であります / 小雪VSアリサ 深海の決闘 であります

REGULAR.description:
Keroro and the platoon torment the Hinata siblings with stoplights planted throughout the house. Later, Keroro is addicted to an invasion simulation video game that may show him how to do it in real life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Red Light of Fear / Keroro, Invasion Plus Minus
ケロロ 恐怖の赤信号 であります / ケロロ 侵略プラスマイナスであります

REGULAR.description:
The Keroro Platoon opens a ramen shop, selling all kinds of strange and creative ramen, such as one made with Gundam-shaped noodles.  But Aki convinces them to go with flavor over originality.  Later, Joriri shows up and gives them all kinds of advice that is his usual style of indecipherable.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aki, Real Ramen / Joriri, False Ramen
秋本当のラーメン であります / ジョリリ 偽りのラーメン であります

REGULAR.description:
Special toilet-centric episode! Chased by Natsumi, Keroro holes up in the bathroom and tries to survive with whatever is on hand. Later, Keroro and company are in town when they`re struck by the need to relieve themselves all at the same time, but can`t seem to find an available toilet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Restroom Survival / Keroro vs Giroro vs Tamama vs Dororo
ケロロ トイレでサバイバル! であります / ケロロ 対ギロロ対タママ対ドロロ であります

REGULAR.description:
Keroro works hard to develop a new special move to help him defeat Natsumi.  And then, he uses Keron-style ventriloquism to make her think she can read minds!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Birth! New Final Technique! / Natsumi Going Through
ケロロ 誕生! 新必殺技! であります / 夏美 ツツヌケ であります

REGULAR.description:
556 can hardly wait to pass the exam to become a space sheriff!  But he`s not doing so well with the practice tests.  Later, the platoon gets captured by Viper, leaving Lavie to rescue them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 556 宇宙刑事だっ! であります / ラビー におまかせ であります
556, Space Sheriff / Lavie, Leave it to Me

REGULAR.description:
Chief Nurse Pururu is leaving the platoon and Pekopon for a new, distant outpost. Will Warrant Officer Bariri be able to share his feelings for her before she goes? Then Alisa and Momoka compete with each other in an icy obstacle course. The prize: a vacation with Fuyuki in Hokkaido!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pururu, Pekopon Love Tour / Alisa & Momoka, Women`s Battle
プルル めぐり愛ペコポン であります / アリサ&桃華 女の戦い であります

REGULAR.description:
Natsumi`s stuck at the store and needs an umbrella to get home.  Keroro and Giroro fight for the right to do it!  Then Keroro orders a drink (it`s not alcoholic, really!) that makes the platoon act like a bunch of drunken idiots for New Year`s Eve.  But it has a funny twist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro VS Giroro, Duel in the Cold Rain / Keroro Platoon, Big Year-End Party
ケロロVSギロロ 氷雨の中の決闘! であります / ケロロ小隊 大忘年会 であります

REGULAR.description:
When an accumulation of rejected invasion plans come together to form a sentient giant monster with a grudge, its first target is the Hinata family. Then a freak accident turns Keroro into a soul that can possess items. He uses his new, phantom-like existence to terrorize Natsumi, whom he blames.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Rejected Operation Bouquet / Keroro, Dear Natsumi
ケロロ ボツ作戦大作戦 であります / ケロロ 拝啓,夏美殿 であります

REGULAR.description:
A Keronian named Orara, with an amazing invasion aura, comes to stay!  And then, Tamama gets stuck to Dororo after accidentally breaking Keroro`s precious toy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Invader`s Aura / Dororon? Tamama-kun
ケロロ 侵略者のオーラ であります / ドロロ ん?タママ君 であります

REGULAR.description:
When Fuyuki puts on a special jersey from Keron, he becomes Jerseyman, a globetrotting superhero with a special interest in cryptids. Then, the Keroro Platoon and the Hinata family all inadvertently suck on cough drops that cause them to spout weird little phrases at the end of each sentence. What`s even weirder is that they seem to enjoy it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki, Birth! Jerseyman Fuyuki / Keroro, the Great Throat Candies
冬樹 誕生!ジャージマン冬樹 であります / ケロロ 素敵なのど飴 でありまちんぴょろ

REGULAR.description:
The trial run for Keroro`s latest invasion plan involves mixing up all the buttons and switches in the Hinata home, but when he tries to go "wide," the underground base`s buttons get messed up, too. Then, when everyone is mad at Keroro, he uses a device to erase their negative short-term memories, but finds the process addictive...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Invading Daily Life / Keroro, Hooray For Reset
ケロロ 日常を侵略せよ であります / ケロロ リセット万歳 であります

REGULAR.description:
Mois fills in for "Uncle" when he`s out, but realizes that she`s being "too perfect" as Keroro`s proxy... Then Aki somehow finds herself in the underground base, fully armed and stalking the cat that stole her glasses.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mois, Chronicle of Uncle`s Hard Battles / Aki vs Cat, Mixed Martial Arts Match
モア オジサマ奮闘記 であります / 秋VSネコ 異種格闘技戦! であります

REGULAR.description:
Another special short skit-filled episode and this time the challenge is to do 22 skits in 15 minutes! Or, if that proves impossible, maybe 22 skits in 30 minutes? Starring the Keroro Platoon, the Hinata family, and guest-stars galore!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: This Time is Gero Gero 15 Minutes / Giroro, Show Me
こんどはゲロゲロ15分 であります / ギロロ 見せてくれ! であります

REGULAR.description:
It`s time for Keronian-style hot pot!  It`s... a little strange.  And then, Natsumi thinks she`s found out 623`s secret identity!  Could it possibly be...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nabebe, Yaminabe Magistrate / Natsumi, 623`s Identity
ナベベ 闇鍋奉行! であります / 夏美 623の正体 であります

REGULAR.description:
Sad that no one notices her, the Ghost Girl has decided to move on.  And then, the platoon put Giroro to sleep and gives him dreams about Natsumi so that he won`t notice the real her is in trouble from the platoon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Spirit-chan, I`ll Rest in Peace / Giroro, Even After Dreaming Time
幽霊ちゃん 私 成仏します であります / ギロロ 夢見る頃を過ぎても であります

REGULAR.description:
A robot comes from the future to help Keroro be less of a screw-up... but not in the way you`d expect. It`s 623`s final radio show, and Natsumi`s invited! Can she resist the urge to shatter the mystery?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Visitor from the Future / 623, Tragedy of the Radio Star
ケロロ 未来からの訪問者 であります / 623 ラジオスターの悲劇 であります

REGULAR.description:
Ouka Nishizawa decides to retire to be more of a mother to Momoka. But is that what she really wants, deep down? Fuyuki joins the Keroro Platoon on a rescue mission to Area 51! Can they all avoid setting off the sneaky death flags?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ouka Resigns / Keroro Must Survive
桜華 引退! であります / ケロロ 君は生き残ることができるか であります

REGULAR.description:
To save Planet Keron from a super-powerful cosmic enemy, the frogs of the Keron Platoon metamorphose into dragons! Then, Mois helps her doppelgänger Asami to study for her last university entrance exam!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Platoon, Real Dragon Warriors / Mois, That One Other Person`s Spring
ケロロ小隊 真ドラゴンウォリアーズ であります / モア もうひとりへの春 であります

REGULAR.description:
Aki mentions on the phone that "haru" is coming, and Keroro immediately assumes that it must be a person, not "haru" as in the season of "spring."  Then there`s a huge snafu with the Keron Army inviting the friends of the Keroro Platoon to come visit Keron... with some ulterior motive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hinata Family, Haru Returns
日向家 春,帰還 であります

REGULAR.description:
Sergeant Keroro tries to invade the world by making multiple copies of himself, and then the platoon tries to do military training exercises because they think Fuyuki is doing them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, The world`s Sgt. Keroros / Keroro, Keron Army Style Excursion Great Opening!
ケロロ 世界のケロロ軍曹 であります / ケロロ ケロン軍式遠足大公開! であります
